title: Anime
description: An Anime within the Zyp Database

id.description: ID of the Anime. Usually the lowercase name without special characters and all spaces replaced with dashes. Must be unique.

name.description: The translated (non-romanized) English name of the Anime.

description.description: The short description of the Anime. Usually breifly explains the plot and has a hook to get viewers interested

seasons.description: A list of the IDs of all the Seasons of this Anime
